price: Tidaklah yang mereka tunggu, melainkan hanya satu teriakan saja yang tidak ada baginya saat berselang 1301.
arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٖ
footnotes: 1301.  Satu teriakan itu ialah untuk tanda hari Kiamat dan teriakan ini amat keras dan cepat.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
